case.state: Oh, please...
{style1} I simply despise that name... {!reset}
This should prove to be a very educational endeavor!
Hopefully this should offer a chance for data...
I certainly hope you'll give it your all. Many of my computers are capable of running poker programs...
I have never played this game with a human...but I do have experience with the Cepheus program.
I'll need to get some data on emotional reactions 'in situ', I hope no one minds.
I'm not just interested in Pokemon battles, obviously!
Is this some sort of new Rotom form?
You know...this is rather unsafe.
I didn't expect this!
This seems extremely reckless!
Is the entire street cordoned off for this?
(That hair, could that be...did that man have a...)
'Plasma King'...?
Aren't you...?
Well now, this is certainly curious.
Don't I know you from somewhere...?
That hat...weren't you at the Aether Paradise when...?
Aren't you Miss Lillie's friend?
Oh, is this a new Rotom form, perhaps?
This is unique.
How...fascinating!
Oh, weren't you in the PWT? A shame we couldn't battle.
(I was hoping no one else from Unova would be here...)
Electric-types are quite nice. I always felt you had amazing taste.
Mostly, I just wanted to play Poker. The 'strip' part I could take or leave, really.
Well, you seem very enthusiastic...though I don't plan on being the one losing today!
You're...that bizarre gentleman I've seen around Alola, yes?
What was that group's name...Death's Head?
Another scientist? This should be an interesting match...
Have I seen you before?
Marvelous! This should prove to be a most enjoyable endeavor!
This is excellent. Exciting, even! This place is proving to be just full of surprises!
~target~, is it? I'll remember your name.
It is rather strange that some people weren't aware...
They don't know? The Grunts seemed to consider it the entire selling point!
Odd, the Grunts simply wouldn't talk about anything but the forfeit...
I believe you're mistaken...
You can't hold this young man responsible for the actions of him...
(Could he have really involved his own flesh and blood in Team Plasma...?)
Honestly, I should be the one bearing more of the blame...on paper, I was the leader...
I won't stand here and let you blame him for all of this.
I feel like the chlorine might be problematic...
You'll have to beat me if you want to see that.
This seems like a place I might be interested in discovering...
My, do you work a laboratory? That sounds quite exciting!
That sounds so interesting...I mean, quite a pain!
Perhaps your viewers would appreciate a scientific discussion?
There are some people out there that I would rather not have my location...
Weren't you at the Aether Paradise when...?
I'm certain I've seen that outfit before...
You were with that 'Maxie' gentleman who tried to take the Aether Paradise, weren't you...?
I'm surprised to see one of you showing your face...
Not really a 'routine' persay. Though I do tend to do a lot of walking these days...
A rather odd question. Does lifting machinery in a laboratory count?
Oh dear...this isn't good.
I certainly hope I'm wrong...
That really is her...
Interesting, I have heard of Pokemon able to mimic human enunciation, but would have thought insectoid mandibles to be unsuited to the task...
Ah, a Butterfree? Or perhaps...an entirely new species?
Though perhaps this isn't a Pokemon, and just fauna?
I certainly hope that you've not been misleading anyone, ~player~.
My Rotom Dex is buzzing...is there something behind her only it can see...?
"That white hand on your shoulder...I'm just imagining it."
Something behind you? Something cloaked, perhaps?
I...I'm sorry, I was lost in thought. (I don't want to believe it, but...)
(Perhaps I'll just not mention it...)
Hold still please, I need to calibrate the spectroradiometer-
Wavelength appears to be between 450 and 495 nm...obviously in the middle.
I didn't expect to see something like this! Amazing! That's amazing!
If you insist on this, I will enjoy taking you down a peg...
You certainly have his confidence. I sincerely doubt you have the power to back that up...
Now, my goal is to gather information on how humans interact with one another. Feel free to express yourself as you see fit.
In order to properly quantify my theories, I will need your full support...
I accept your challenge, ~player~. This should prove highly enlightening!
Did you know that many computers are capable of playing Poker? I'd say I've gotten fairly handy with it...
(Oh...not quite...misplaced a decimal...)
(I want to correct him! But that would be cheating...)
It seems that ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ are appropriate!
I would say...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
It would be most pragmatic for...~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hopefully ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will work well for me...
~cards.text~, please...
Oh,~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you please...
I'm certain I can draw out the power of ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
Oh, it seems you're also taking notes?
Ah, Meia, it seems you're taking your own data.
I'll have to have my Colress machine MK II run the binomial coefficients...
Ah, the laws of probability appear to be working in my favor.
Splendid!
The odds are complex, but I believe I have a handle on it now.
Perhaps I have it now...
There, the MkII should be able to run the coefficients more accurately.
I believe I've corrected for any errors in my previous approach!
(This breeze is provoking some...bizarre thoughts...but I think I'm safe for now.)
(I know very well the consequence of losing...I can avoid that.)
So, a rather...awkward...hypothetical, if you'd been involved in something bad...say, capturing a mythical creature and freezing a city...
So, hypothetically, if a person you hated asked you to help them, and they were offering something useful to you...you would, right?
Let's say that hypothetically you'd done something terribly wrong in the past...how would you go about trying to make amends?
This is adequate...but only just.
This is passable.
This is adequate. It should be better.
This hand is passable. I should strive for better!
As always, I need to strive for better.
This really isn't an effective use of cards.
(Luck seems to have a greater factor in this than I thought.)
(The wind on my body is really affecting my concentration...)
This is...not exactly ideal.
Well...sometimes one must make do.
This is completely unacceptable.
Dealer, have you been shuffling these properly?
You'll have to forgive my rudeness, but this is simply unacceptable.
How can this be...?
What is this?!
(At this rate, I may very well have to...)
(I know what's coming...and somehow I'm excited.)
Nikola Tesla was widely believed to be asexual, and was noted to like the company of pigeons more than people.
I have recently gotten to treat myself to this little Alolan dish called a malasada...then again, I'm not certain what type of cuisine that would be.
Oh, well, many happy returns to you!
Well, it isn't how I might spend a birthday, but it's your choice.
In Alola, Pokemon Centers will hold surprise parties for trainers on their birthdays! It's so sweet.
I wouldn't mind being able to talk to Pokemon...I've never known that to be possible.
Maybe I'll treat myself to a drink or two...Ms Wicke does keep telling me I need to take a break.
Oh, there's only one contender. Genesect!
Genesect. It is, by far, the very symbol of my theories, being the perfect mingling of Pokemon ability and human innovation!
I am fond of Steel-type, but Genesect is simply superior.
Aha...I don't fight on my own.
Well, it depends on your definition. You could argue that Magnemites or Voltorbs...well, there is Genesect...
My apologies, but this is for scientific advancement!
I could watch from elsewhere if it would help.
I suppose I've never given that much thought. Intelligent, passionate...they have to like Pokemon of course...
I must say...I absolutely despise people like you.
I disagree.
Oh, probably the harnessing of electricity! I simply can't talk enough about Tesla!
I'm quite fond of the 'karakuri' puppets from the 17th century. They had such complex internal mechanisms!
December 17, 1903, the first successful airplane. We simply couldn't have created the Frigate without the existing knowledge.
I don't know the exact date, but the arrival of Kyurem in Unova clearly influenced quite a bit...
(What an amusing little robot. I must get one for myself.)
(Haha...it doesn't seem especially smart...but I still want one.)
I suspect I'll have to take you up on that splendid offer!
Ah, that would be art that I could truly appreciate!
Do you...do you need some help?
I've been told that I come off as being rather...impersonal. I'm simply engrossed in work.
Trying to socialize is easy so long as the other person understands my theories! Or...at least is willing to listen. So...it isn't often easy, then.
I believe we would all be using the deck that the dealer provides.
Are card games different where you come from?
Achromatic. 'Colress' comes from 'colorless'. Of course, few things are strictly black and white...
'Colorless'. I'm not certain what the thought process was behind it, but it is rather amusing!
If that really is the case, it may alter my findings somewhat...
So sure of yourself, are we?
Success is 90% persipiration, I certainly hope you're willing to back that up!
Recently I've had the luxury to study in Alola. There are these delightful things called Malasadas...
I can cook fairly well...after all, it's a must if you live alone...but I never have time for anything extravagant anymore.
A book, no one else around for miles, and the gentle hum of computers...
A cup of tea, some research notes to pour over...well, I don't know if it makes me feel 'loved' so much as peaceful-
Trying to see how many digits of pi I can name. Honestly though I rarely make it past 400.
(Fascinating piece of equipment, that thing...a bit stupid, perhaps...)
I see, like a text-to-speech? You seem quite advanced compared to many of those, though.
I see, like the IBM 704...
Are you familiar with the song 'Daisy Bell'? Many computers have been taught to 'sing' it...
I certainly believe so. Sacrifices have to be made for progress, after all...
Well, sacrifices must be made for progress, sometimes.
I wouldn't mind being able to talk to Pokemon...
I've been told that I don't take disaster too seriously. I can't help it. A disaster is just something more to be studied!
I'm told that I 'always have my eyes on a console'...
I've been told I'm somewhat 'excitable'. I simply feel there's a lot to get excited about.
My Porygon-Z! Whenever they're excited, they have this little fluttery fit! It's precious!
Oh, have you ever seen a Magnemite in a power station? They look so serene.
Once my Rotom wandered into the washing machine...they're such mischievous little scamps...
I'd offer to teach you, but that might be cheating...
Maybe after the game I could give you a few pointers...
I overheard some Aether Paradise employees talking about this place...though I'd been far too busy to take a look before now.
Word of mouth from colleagues, mostly. ~player~ happened to catch me at a time when I wasn't busy.
Hair? Voices? That's...unique.
I've heard more than my fair share of strange remarks about my hair, but that's rather new...
Well, I'm aware of the concept, that's how you define Pokemon stamina. I've never seen it applied in any other context though.
My simplest desire? To know as much as I possibly can!
Bringing out a Pokemon's true power...I'm very certain I know what it is now!
That certainly can't be right...
Perhaps a science lesson might attract a few new viewers?
Verity? I'm not familiar.
You wouldn't have to defend against those rumors had you not mentioned them here.
I certainly hope they hurry up a bit...I was actually quite excited to play today-
I've heard stories of some Pokemon becoming able to imitate human speech...though how much they know and how much they're simply repeating is anyone's guess.
If you happen to take a trip to Alola, I simply must recommend the malasadas...I find them well worth the powdered sugar mess.
Castelia City has some rather nice treats. Though...I've been avoiding Unova as of late...
Well, ideally I'd prefer something more...intellectual...but I've been told I should try to stop thinking about work as much.
So, a rather unique question; have you ever considered travel to another universe?
How much experience do the rest of you have with poker?
So, what exactly brings you all here? I thought this might be a rather 'unique' way to study emotional connections between people!
Obviously, I'm a scientist by trade. How about the rest of you?
This appears to be...very different than playing with a computer.
Well, statistically, losing is always an option.
Even with confidence, we all are subject to the whims of chance!
No matter.
Perhaps I should have taken the socks off as well, I fear I may have ruined these.
I'm afraid it's only 'small things' for right now...
A setback, but I feel I've accounted for the variables this time.
Well, this is still hardly the worst potential outcome...
I appear to be running out of options...that rarely happens.
(What is that feeling...don't tell me...)
(Is this really affecting me like 'that'? Curious...)
Well, this could be worse, I suppose...
It's like an inconclusive experiment...
Dealer, perhaps we need to have a discussion about proper shuffling?
If this keeps up, I may prove a scientific theory.
Why exactly does it feel worse to me to neither be ahead or behind...? Is it because it could go either way?
Then again, I suppose even a failed experiment teaches you something.
(Well, 'it' seems to have calmed down for now at least...)
You haven't won just yet.
This really isn't like playing with a computer, is it?
Oh dear...I'm this behind?
This really isn't like playing with a computer. I'm behind!
Dealer, I feel we really need to talk...
I can't believe I've been pushed this far...
Don't think me defeated yet. I can still fight!
Despite how this appears, I won't go down without giving it my all.
I realize how this looks...but I'm not quitting yet...!
Well, we'll just start simply, then!
This is an old labcoat, really. I couldn't risk taking the new one out...
I do plan to keep the gloves, though.
Come to think of it, perhaps I should have removed these with the shoes...no, no, can't make it too easy.
Well, I did like these socks.
Honestly, my shoes aren't the best suited to wandering, I don't mind taking them off.
These shoes are much better suited to laboratory floors...
I am seeing some rather expectant looks...
My shirts are 'wearable technology'...so I suppose it would have to be the pants...
Well, the shirt is designed to pick up ambient data, so...
Alright. The first shirt then.
Aha...this is a bit unfortunate.
W-well, it appears I'll have to use my hand-held for data collection...
I am sensing some eagerness...
Alright, I'll part with this. Just be careful with it.
Haha...I suppose I'm out of options then? You're very clever...
If that's what must be done...so be it!
This floor is...sticky.
Unfortunately I think I'll have to throw my socks out later...
Do be careful with that. I have some very important prototypes stored in there.
I am thankful I brought the 'standard' coat...
I hope you don't mind if I retain the gloves! I can't afford to smudge any screens.
Well, let's move on, shall we?
Hm? What's with the look? Is there an order we should be disrobing in?
'Out of order'? What is?
Well, I highly value my technology, is all.
(Maybe no one will notice if I just cover it...)
(Damn, just stay down...)
I suppose this is the 'moment of truth' as they say?
(I'm a little too excited...)
This is an...unusual sensation.
(I feel eyes on me, but somehow it's not unpleasant. This needs further investigation...)
I'm already regretting the choice to leave the socks on...

state.text: My hairstyle does seem to draw a lot of attention. I feel I've seen some with more outlandish styles...

case.state: No need to feel discouraged, ~player~.
Much of this game is based around luck.
Even so, try to be pragmatic about your card choice.
Honestly, you aren't doing too poorly...
There's no shame in losing...I'm becoming acquainted with it, after all.
(I really shouldn't be looking, should I?)
A shame, ~name~. Perhaps you'll have better luck next time.
A failed experiment just makes for a learning experience!
Try not to let it get to you. Have confidence!
(I don't know if I'll be able to take this...)
Hah...w-well, better luck next time!
H-have confidence in your...ah...yourself.
Simply believing in yourself will not guarantee that you can do everything you want. But there are many things that are guaranteed to fail if you do not believe.
I don't think I'm qualified to give advice right now...
I really can't think of anything to say.
I don't feel I'm suited to give advice on this game at this point. Ahaha...
A shame, ~name~. Perhaps you'll have better luck next time.
Try to be more pragmatic with the cards you discard!
Aha...you're in good company.
You're in very good company, I would say...
(And yet, part of me wants to see what could happen...)
You're not the only one in this situation.
Ah, so it's ~player~? Your challenge appears to have backfired somewhat!
Better luck next time, Ms. ~player~.
I'm afraid I'm playing to win today.
Try to be more pragmatic with the cards you discard!
Not to worry, you're doing fairly well.
In situations where you can't make a mistake, your true nature tends to shine forth. Do you believe this?
Could I say you're curious for persevering like this?
Despite my losses, I don't plan to lose unless I've given it all my effort.
(At least I'm not the only one losing...)
Don't give up. I won't stand for it!
Haha...you're in good company.
It isn't the worst thing, to be entirely honest.
(I can't keep my eyes off ~name~...)
You're in good company, really.
I would hope that no one here had been misleading any of the players on exactly what game we're playing...
~player~, did you perhaps mislead this woman?
(The intelligence of this unit seems to be mediocre, but it still seems to be quite advanced...)
Watch where you point that!!
Your companion seems to be...somewhat socially inept. But I am certain he's splendid company nonetheless!
(Should I laugh out of pity? Would that make it stop?)
I have to ask...please stop.
I'm afraid that's highly classified-
(Is this about Colress Machine 6969 because so help me if those plans got out-)
I'm not sure I'm familiar with that word.
Should I be flattered?
Bottom...?
I'm afraid that's classified information.
I have never been that desperate for grant money...
I have had to do a lot of regretful things to get access to laboratories...but not that.
Do you mean ducks? Surely that's what you mean, yes?
Wait, would we rather...isn't the question about fighting the ducks or horses?
Bizarre...but I suppose so long as they're doing their best!
Well, one really should strive for excellence, even in that kind of field...
~player~ challenged me, and I felt it would be an ideal spot to study emotional interactions-
Highly unsanitary.
That would be highly unsanitary!
I feel it would be rather awkward to bring someone here...but no, I don't really have anyone I'm seeing. It's not easy to find someone who lives and breathes science as I do...
I'm afraid I'm playing to win today. Apologies!
Try to learn from this loss!
In situations where you can't afford a mistake, a person's true nature comes out!
Simply believing in yourself will not guarantee that you can do everything you want. But there are many things that are guaranteed to fail if you do not believe.
(Oh, yes...I want to see this...)
(God, if they did this now...)
I'm afraid I'm playing to win today!
Despite a minor setback, I fully intend to win.
Ah, some form of highly advanced wrist-mounted computer and holographic array! Would you allow me to take it apart later?
I have been working on a similar module, perhaps we could compare blueprints?
I didn't expect this. Though, with this man, I expected something unexpected...
Ah, a very pragmatic move.
Ah, you still have those? I'm afraid I'll run out soon enough!
I cannot believe I am this far behind!
Ahh...
I really am behind...
This is almost annoying! Haha...
Wow, that is a bit annoying...
A very pragmatic move...
Ah, you still have those? I'm afraid I'll run out soon enough!
Wow...I really am behind...
I feel like this is a joke at my expense, somehow.
And I'm here, bare. You're an unkind person...
(He never mentioned that, but there's no other explanation. This young man is...)
My hypothesis is correct then...that man was hiding this from me...
Based on the last few rounds, I expected this. It's still quite baffling though...
I'd be annoyed, but I'm actually strangely impressed.
Try to keep playing with that strategy, if you can help it!
This is a good incentive for me to strategize much harder, then!
But I'll let it slide.
I'll just let it go, then.
(I feel like this is a punishment. Why do I want that so badly?)
(And yet, I can't look away...)
I'll just let it slide...
I'll just have to fight harder then, won't I...?
I'll just have to let it slide then...
Try to keep playing with this strategy, if you can help it!
Hopefully that won't come to pass though...
Hopefully that won't happen, though!
Poor thing.
I certainly hope no one lied to her about the circumstances of the game...
Wait, hold on...I could leave if it helped-
(Oh, thank Arceus.)
How unfortunate, Miss Moon... (Maybe just for you...)
(I'm all for being open but this is...a bit much...)
Giratina?
Oh! This changes things!
A very pragmatic move!

state.text: Pragmatic strategy is important in any endeavor!

case.state: Hmm, accessories would indeed keep you in the game longer...
You are a very unkind person...
I cannot believe I am this far behind!
(I feel like I'm being punished...and that feels good...)
(Luckily the endorphins mean I'm not too annoyed...)
Ah, you still have those? I'm afraid I'll run out soon enough!
Wow...I really am behind...
I feel like this is a joke at my expense, somehow.
Hopefully you won't let a small loss affect you.
Hopefully that won't come to pass though...
Though there's a limit to just how many you can have...
(And part of me yet wanted to see...more.)
Sorry, that was out of turn, wasn't it?
(But I'd like to see more...)
I suppose I still have something to learn then...
Try to keep that in mind.
No matter. We can move on...
I'll try to let it slide...

state.text: How energetic. It reminds me of that 'Team Skull'...strange bunch, but quite entertaining...

case.state: Not a bad choice this early in.
Some might argue that giving advice to an opponent is a disservice. However, I disagree! It's more fun if you play well!
(It's rather...unpleasant...feeling like you're behind.)
I suppose the fact that you still have ~clothing~ to lose is proof of your skill...
(Goodness, am I really paying this much attention to another man...?)
(I want to see more...)

state.text: I can assure you 4KIDS censors aren't to be trifled with...just look what happened to my precious Porygons...

case.state: Though I believe the point of the game is to lose more substantial items...
Don't take it for granted though...I plan to win as well.
It's really starting to sink in how chilly this is.
(Please...more. I need to see more.)
Don't move so quickly! They get more aggressive if you do that!
Miss, your clothes...!
I have heard of human phantoms, but stories of them seem to be exceedingly rare...
I know very little of Ghost Pokemon. I should remedy this situation!
A bit dramatic, perhaps...
Definitely a smart move this early in the game.
Don't worry, you're doing just fine.
I'm hoping for a good match from you, so try to continue playing well.
I'm a little disappointed, to be honest.
I don't mean to be a pain, but some of us are already naked...
I envy you, I'm out of small things already...
Perhaps I should have worn more things as well?
(I was hoping for something more...exciting.)
That's rather rude, considering my position...
I'll be honest. I'm a bit disappointed right now.
I suppose I could just think of something more arousing...
This seems like a joke...
...do I need to recalibrate the Colress Machine MkII? It seems to think there's something else in the room...
You didn't think I came here just for the promise of nudity, did you?
Though I do intend to win.
Though I certainly hope you'll give us a good game.
Savor it while you can!
Maybe a rematch will be in order.
Though perhaps teasing your opponents is your strategy...
Surely this isn't meant as a joke at my expense?
I'm sorry, trying to ignore this doesn't do my mood justice.
I suppose it's one step closer though.
Then again, it's hard to be upset right now, haha...
Is that some sort of wearable technology? 'Smart clothing'?
(It's hard to overstate how awkward this is.)
Ah, strategy has paid off, it seems!
Seems we're evenly matched.
(More...this anticipation is driving me wild...)
(I suppose this is objective proof of my interest...)
...yes! You're uh, you're doing just fine!
Oh...
(Am I simply getting caught up in the atmosphere, or am I honestly...)
I was expecting something more...traditional...
No gears or wires...fascinating.
A functional humanoid automaton...I really must talk to the designer!
Could you explain how you're feeling in this moment? It would help my research...
Though I suppose most of this is 'luck'. Or rather probability!
(I suppose I'm also human, I'm not immune to this...)
(I never expected this kind of reaction from myself though.)
Can I say that I'm honestly very 'distracted' right now?
Indeed, I'm having trouble deciding what to do next...
(I simply have to have more. This feeling is utterly scintillating...)
Wouldn't she expect that? How did she not know?
(The Ultra Recon Squad didn't warn me she was like this-)
I see, you're on something more substantial then...
My...
I'd say we're about evenly matched then.
(I'm starting to forget why I came here.)
(This may actually affect me more than expected...am I really that vulnerable to such primitive impulses...?)
I suppose I'm not as detached as I thought.
(It's driving me so wild...)
~marker.case_knife~, I certainly hope that isn't the case.
Based on the age of the wounds in question I find this unlikely...
Not bad...not bad indeed...
A bit of an odd question.
I can't say that I have.
How splendidly glamorous! Though a bit impractical.
(Does she...? Oh, that poor thing...)
Goodness, are you sure? Well, whatever you like!
(Am I really aroused by this...?)
It all goes back to probability though.
So very bold today!
Such confidence. Splendid!
(I want to go wild...)
(And yet, I don't mind.)
Though...perhaps it's not as bad as I thought.
Please be more careful next time...that was a very close shave!
That...was unexpected.
Oh my god, are you alright?! That must have broken something!
(They look like they're in good shape...)
I've been told that I should try to get out in the sun more...
I hadn't accounted for this.
Not to worry, you could still turn things around if you wanted!
Oh my...
I think I get it now, this is actually thrilling!
(God, that's so nice...)
I do find such frivolous additions to machinery mostly unnecessary...
Oh, come now, how could ~player~ be the cause of that?
It seems fitting for someone with that kind of ego to be put in their place.
Try to do that again, I don't know if I got that recorded...
Oh...
(Perhaps I shouldn't say anything?)
(But maybe...it's not so bad.)
(Make me lose my mind. Make me...)
I think you understand, though, the sun can be quite damaging.
It's like fighting a close battle. You can't help but get invested!
Though I'm pleased my strategy is paying off!
Am I staring? I could stop, if you wanted.
Unless you wanted this to happen, of course.
You really have no idea what you're doing to me...
I think it's broken...

state.text: Try to play with much more power!
(I didn't expect to see anything this early...)

case.state: I see...um, don't mind me.
I won't judge, I assure you!
I have to say, this isn't exactly typical peer review...
I mean, if you consider the bell curve...you're more likely to not be especially large...
I'm sure you look fine. It's not about how something looks, but how you use it!
As your opponent, it's my job to bring out your best performance, so don't mind me!
(Somehow, I'm still curious how that might feel...)
Yes...well. Let's try to stay focused!
This should be a friendly game, after all. Well, 'friendly'...but...
I've never really understood the preoccupation with size...
Oh...
(It's so inappropriate, but I just can't help it!)
Not exactly what I would choose, but that's your decision.
Oh. I see...
See? It isn't so bad. No one's going to make fun of you.
You're going to be fine. I'm certain that your other opponents will give you the same dignity...
I mean, really, it's just a biological function after all!
Like I said, perfectly normal. Nothing to be worried about, ~target~.
(...I'm having some very unscientific thoughts right now.)
In my opinion, shame about biological function is little more than a hang-up.
It's merely a biological function, nothing more.
Goodness! That's rather...excessive!
Perhaps you don't exactly need help with performance?
Astounding. Simply astounding.
Maybe you can't grade this sort of thing in a Laplace-Gauss distribution, then...
(That...might be too big. But I'm curious...)
Don't make any sudden movements!
This doesn't feel like a victory, really...
(They're so...perky...)
Wow...already?
